channel.title: Long Horizon Notes
channel.description: Investing conversations for normal humans: frameworks, risk, and the habits that matter more than predictions.
channel.itunes:author: Nora Bakker

item.title: Episode 1: Index Investing Without the Myths (with Daniel Cho)
item.description: What indexing does well, where people still make mistakes, and how to think about fees and behavior.

item.title: Episode 2: Real Estate: Numbers Before Narratives (with Isabel Martins)
item.description: Cap rates, maintenance, vacancy, leverage, and the difference between “cash flow” and “stress test.”

item.title: Episode 3: Risk Management for People Who Hate Spreadsheets (with Kasper Jansen)
item.description: A longer conversation on risk: position sizing, drawdowns, diversification that actually diversifies, and decision rules you can follow when emotions spike.
